title: Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game
body: Hi i have a little problem like this Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game when i start game i see black screen and this comunicat i can't connect to chat in client can somebody help me please i just want play 1 game :(

replies.body:
Those entirely black loading screens can be a pretty good sign most of the time that your client is having problems getting a solid connection with our game servers. You're able to connect to the login and matchmaking servers just fine it seems, but something is giving your network an especially hard time when trying to connect to the game specifically.

Let's double check that your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) are still properly configured by following that guide. Let me know if that doesn't seem to help however, and we can troubleshoot a little further!
